name: Shikanosuke
text: Hnn... Take thaaaaaaaaaaat!!!
Shikanosuke, who bravely jumped out despite being afraid, let his shuriken fly.

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Ridiculous!! Shuriken are useless against my immortal spirit body!!』

name: Shikanosuke
text: Heh-hehe! Sorry, but this isn't your average shuriken!

name: Shikanosuke
text: ーElectric Jutsu: Spark!!!

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: Hghgh?!?
*Bzz bzzzーBOOOOOOOOM!!!!!*
The shuriken reacted to the static electricity Shikanosuke had released, and they exploded right in front of the butler's eyes.
These were explosive shuriken, custom-made for Shikanosuke by the Gosha maintenance department.

name: Hebiko
text: Nice, Shikanosuke-chan! Now's our chance～!!

name: Hebiko
text: ーFour Blade Style - Octo-Strike!!!
As the ghost butler was losing his form due to the explosion, Hebiko assaulted him with an Octo-Jump.
With the strength of her tough octopus legs and her four ninjato, she cut up the butler's spiritual body and dispersed it.
However...

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『ーOhohohohoh!! Are you done with your attacks, octopus girl?』

name: Hebiko
text: Ehhhhhhh!!?
The butler's body, which had been dispersed, reformed like nothing had ever happened.

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Then, I guess it is my turn now.』

name: Hebiko
text: Uwaahh!? No way!? Hebiko's in big trouble?
*Whizz!!! Whoosh, whizz!!!*

name: Poltergeist
text: Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!
These were poltergeists.
These poltergeists controlled by "Netherworld Jutsu" twisted around the furniture and decorations and threw them violently at Hebiko.

name: Shikanosuke
text: H-Hebiko!!?

name: Hebiko
text: H-Hebiko's okay... but, this might be a bit rough...!
Hebiko parried the attacks from the poltergeists with her Ninjato, but there were so many of them that she could only focus on defending herself.

name: Me
text: (Well... I guess it can't be helped.)
And as I watched them struggle I was sneaking on the edges toward the end of the hall, approaching Yukikaze's room.
I had expected it to be a hard fight for the two of them.
More so than that, we knew from the start that we had no chance of winning against that immortal ghost butler at all.
But if they could catch the attention of that ghost old man as a diversion then...

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Insolent boy!! Did you think that you really think you could deceive me!?』

name: Me
text: Hghheeeeeeh!!?
All of a suddenー
Smoke arose from the floor right in front of me, and the butler of the Netherworld appeared from within.

name: Me
text: ...You've got some good eyes, old man. So you realized it was a distraction from the start?

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Didn't I say that I knew you were crafty, Fuma!? You fool!』
The butler of the Netherworld laughed loudly and made the surrounding objects fly around.

name: Me
text: Hmm? Then do you know what this means?ーーー "Three."
I turned to the ghost old man floating before me, and raised three of my fingers.

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『...Three?』

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Ohohohohー!! I know, boy. This is the time remaining before your death!!』
The furniture and decorations flying around began to spin above my head violently.

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『There!! Three～, two～～!!』
The ghost old man began to count down in high spirits.
As he had said, if he made the flying furniture fall on me it would surely only take an instant for me to kick the bucket.

name: Me
text: Mwahaha... I'm so sorry old man, but that's incorrect!!!

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Hnngh!? Incorrect!?』
While I was avoiding the furniture I sent a signal to my partner who was observing us.

name: Me
text: Yeah, that's right! "Three" is the number of shuriken that Shikanosuke threw!!

name: Me
text: He already made one of these three explode. But the two others are still stuck in your body... Shikanosuke!!

name: Shikanosuke
text: G-Got it, Fuma!! Here we gooooo!!

name: Shikanosuke
text: Electric Jutsu: Spark!!!
*Bzz bzzzーBOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Hnnghooooohhhhhhhhhhhhhh～～～!???』
Shikanosuke used static electricity to make the two remaining shuriken stuck in his back explodeー
The butler of the Netherworld had been completely obliterated and blown away.

name: Me
text: Now!! Get to the room you two!

name: Hebiko and Shikanosuke
text: Right!!
*Clinkー!!*
We opened the door, rushed inside, and saw a young girl in a uniform with a large headset on in front of monitors.

name: Me
text: There she is!! Yukikaze!!!

name: Yukikaze
text: Uwaaaahh!? Wh-What are you all doing here!!?
Yukikaze took the headset off and looked back at us.
Naturally, she looked completely shocked due to our sudden entrance.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Waaaaahhhhh!! Yukikazeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!!

name: Hebiko
text: Heberybody finally found youuuuu! It was absolutely horrible, that monster butler kept chasing us!!

name: Yukikaze
text: Eh!? Ehhh!? Butler... you mean Uncle!?
Shikanosuke and Hebiko had both clamped onto Yukikaze, ready to burst into tears.
On the other hand, Yukikaze looked like she was still unable to process what was happening.

name: Me
text: Yeah! What's the deal with that butler exactlyー

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『What!? These people were your friends!?』

name: Me
text: WHOAH!!?

name: Me
text: (He recovered already!?)
It was the butler of the Netherworld.
He was supposed to have been completely blown away by the two shuriken explosions by Shikanosuke, but he had already reappeared like it was nothing.

name: Yukikaze
text: What? Uncle, did you jump to conclusions and chase guests around again?

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Hnngh!? Jump toー!?』
The butler of the Netherworld looked puzzled by the words of his master, Yukikaze.

name: Me
text: Again...?

name: Hebiko
text: So he's a repeat offender...

name: Shikanosuke
text: Well, he did seem used to chasing people...

name: Yukikaze
text: Oh, I'm really sorry everyone. Uncle always seems so desperate to protect me, sometimes he even kills people who visit.

name: Me
text: ...Are we just going to ignore that bit at the end there?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Hey, isn't that why nobody knows about Yukikaze's home?

name: Hebiko
text: It's a good thing heberybody survived here...

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Hmmm～, I am so ashamed of my misunderstanding!!』
After being told so by Yukikaze, he finally seemed to calm down from his enrage mode.

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Then, friends!! I have no choice but to apologize by cutting my stomach open...』

name: Me
text: Wait, you're immortal so what's the point of that!!?

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Ohhh!? That is true isn't it, ohohohohー!』
It was a very practiced undead joke.

name: Me
text: (I'm sure that old man isn't the least bit sorry...)

name: Hebiko
text: (Seems like he'll do it again...)

name: Shikanosuke
text: (He's a real troublesome old man...)
We nodded to each other with a fatigued look on our faces.

name: Yukikaze
text: By the way, why are you three even here? Something to do with me?

name: Me
text: Ah!? That's the adventure... I mean, the notebook.

name: Yukikaze
text: Notebook?

name: Hebiko
text: Yes. The notebook Hebiko borrowed before the exams. Hebiko thought that Yukikaze-chan would be in trouble if you didn't have it to study with today.

name: Yukikaze
text: Ohh, this one!! You could've just given it back tomorrow, you know? But thank you anyway, Hebiko♪
Yukikaze's notebook was safely returned by Hebiko.

name: Me
text: (Sheesh, case closed I guess.)
We discovered the secret about Yukikaze's house and Hebiko returned the notes she had borrowed.
And with that today's adventure was over.

name: Me
text: (Hmm? Hold up?)
As I breathed a sigh of relief I finally realized that something was off.
Yukikaze's roomー
It had a completely different feeling compared to all the other old fashioned rooms in the castle.
It had several large monitors, a very high-end PC case, and a gamepad on the deskー

name: Shikanosuke
text: Hey, Yukikaze. Your room is seriously great.
Looking around, Shikanosuke voiced what I was thinking.

name: Me
text: Yeah. This room is clearly that of a gamer.

name: Yukikaze
text: You got a problem with that? Even Taimanin play games you know.

name: Me
text: Well, I guess they do, but how do I put this... this is like the real deal... hmm?

name: Me
text: Wait. Your room, I've seen it somewhere before.

name: Yukikaze
text: ーー!?
Yukikaze stiffened with a start.

name: Hebiko
text: ? What do you mean? Fuma-chan, it's the first time you've come to Yukikaze-chan's house, right?

name: Me
text: Yeah, it is but... hmmm.

name: Yukikaze
text: H-Hey, Fuma! If you're finished here, just go home already!
As I was pondering, Yukikaze suddenly panicked and tried to make me leave her room.

name: Me
text: No, w-wait a moment. I feel like it's on the tip of my tongueー

name: Me
text: (That's it! That chair!!)

name: Me
text: This is the same room as Y-kazeX-chan!!

name: Me
text: That chair too, it's the same chair as the famous streamer Y-kazeX-chan!!!
A silent scream escaped from Yukikaze's throat.

name: Shikanosuke
text: ? Who's this Y-kazeX-chan, Fuma?

name: Me
text: You don't know her, Shikanosuke!!? You're really out of touch man～, she's a streamer Sakura and I are fans of!

name: Me
text: She descended upon the FPS world like a shooting star! She has a 98% headshot percentage!!

name: Me
text: Her legendary 30 kills video has over 1.24 million views!!!

name: Shikanosuke
text: Ehh. I don't really get it, but she sounds like someone really good at games.

name: Me
text: She is! After cheating rumors she started streaming with her face while wearing a mask.

name: Me
text: Which is also great. She has twintails, is flat-chested, sun-tanned, plus the mask makes her a very hot topic...

name: Yukikaze
text: ーーーーーーーーー!!?
The flat-chested, sun-tanned girl with twintails turned away as fast as she could.

name: Me
text: (I-I see...!! So this is how it was!!!)
I had the wrong idea about all of this.
The secret about Yukikaze's house wasn't that it was a castle nor her ghost butler...
The "real" secret about it wasー

name: Me
text: It's youuuuuuuuuuuuu!!? Yukikaze, y-you're THAT Y-kazeX-chan!!?

name: Yukikaze
text: Wh-Wh-Wh-Wh-What are you saying, stupid Fuma! I-I'm not! I know nothing about thaaaaaat!!

name: Me
text: There's no way it's not you!!! This room, that chair, and that small chest!! It can't be anyone but you!!

name: Yukikaze
text: Th-That's just some kind of coincidence! More importantly, just leave or I'll kill you, stupid Fuma!

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『Kill? So this boy was an enemy after all, Miss Yukikaze!? May I kill him and bury him in the backyard!!?』

name: Yukikaze
text: Aaaaahhh!!?? N-No, Fuma is a friend!!! More importantly, killing is forbidden, Uncle!!

name: Clear
text: So? You met Yukikaze?

name: Hebiko
text: Ah, Clear-chan♪

name: Butler of the Netherworld
text: 『What, he is your friend!? Then we need to welcome your friends with the specialty of this house: stir-fried vegetables!』

name: Shikanosuke
text: Ah! I want to eat stir-fried vegetables!

name: Me
text: I got it, damn it!! Then show me your gamer ID!!! With that, I can easily check if it'sー

name: Yukikaze
text: Just leaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaave!!! Everyone, get out of my roooooooooooooooom!!
The voice of Y-kazeX-chan echoed through the tranquil mountains.
It was another peaceful night at the Mizuki castle.
